quick_start_desc: Get started with DataVis in just a few steps. Learn how to upload your data, create your first chart, and explore interactive features.
quick_start_step1: Upload your dataset using the 'New Dataset' button on the homepage or datasets page.
quick_start_step2: Go to the Charts section and click 'New Chart' to begin.
quick_start_step3: Select a chart type, choose your dataset, and customize your visualization.
quick_start_step4: Save and share your chart with your team or audience.
your_first_chart_desc: Follow these steps to create your first chart and visualize your data:
your_first_chart_step1: Choose a dataset from the list or upload a new one.
your_first_chart_step2: Click 'New Chart' and select the chart type that fits your data.
your_first_chart_step3: Configure chart settings, axes, and colors to match your needs.
your_first_chart_step4: Preview your chart and save it for future use.
chat_welcome_subtitle: I can help you create datasets, visualize data, and answer questions.
chat_suggest_create_data_msg: Create a sample dataset of monthly sales for 2025 with 3 regions.
chat_suggest_create_chart_msg: Help me create a new chart to visualize
chat_suggest_how_to_msg: How do I import my own file?
dataset_saveConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to save the changes to this dataset?
docs_ai_chart_analysis_intro: Use AI to automatically analyze your chart data and extract insights, trends, and recommendations.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_how_to: How to use AI Chart Analysis:
chat_prompt_choose_chart_type: Dataset was picked! Please choose chart type.
chat_prompt_dataset_selected_create_char: I selected dataset "{{datasetName}}". Create a chart that fits this data.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_step3: Wait for the AI to process your data.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_step4: Review the generated insights and suggestions.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_tip1: Use clean, well-structured data for more accurate analysis.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_tip2: Choose the chart type that best matches your data and question.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_tip3: Review AI suggestions and validate with your domain knowledge.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_use_case1: Detecting trends and anomalies in time series data.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_example1: Sales increased by 20% in Q2 compared to Q1.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_example2: There is a strong correlation between advertising spend and revenue.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_example3: Anomaly detected in March: unusually high expenses.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_warning: AI analysis is a helpful tool, but always validate results with your own expertise.
docs_ai_chart_analysis_note: Note: AI analysis may not be perfect for all datasets. Use it as a guide, not a replacement for expert review.
chart_editor_dataset_operation_no_datase: Select a dataset to enable filter operations.
chart_editor_select_type_hint: Please select a valid chart type.
chart_editor_mutual_exclusive_desc_aggre: You can only use either Aggregation or Pivot Table at a time. Pivot Table is a more advanced version of aggregation. Switch to Pivot Table tab to use it instead.
chart_editor_mutual_exclusive_desc_pivot: You can only use either Aggregation or Pivot Table at a time. Pivot Table provides more flexibility with rows, columns, values, and filters.
home_barChart_desc: The classic bar chart — unbeaten in simplicity, and more readable than a column chart on mobile screens.
home_lineChart_desc: Perfect for showing trends over time. Connect data points to show how values change.
home_pieChart_desc: Show parts of a whole with this classic circular chart. Best for simple proportions.
home_scatterChart_desc: Explore relationships between two variables. Great for correlation analysis.
home_areaChart_desc: Like line charts, but with filled areas. Perfect for showing quantities over time.
home_mapChart_desc: Visualize geographic data with interactive maps. Show regional differences clearly.
home_tableChart_desc: Sometimes the best visualization is a well-designed table. Sort and search enabled.
home_trendChart_desc: Highlight trends and patterns in your data with advanced trend analysis.
home_chartTypes_title: Responsive & easy-to-use chart types for every need
home_chartTypes_desc: Select a chart type to see what it can do
home_features_title: More than static charts: responsive, customizable and live-updating
home_features_desc: Here's what will make your life easier
home_feature_unlimited_desc: Even with the free plan, there's no limit to the number of charts, maps, and tables you can create.
home_feature_design_desc: Send us your style guide and we'll create a custom design theme for your brand, 100% white-labeled.
home_feature_private_desc: No matter which plan you choose, all your visualizations and data are private until you hit the 'Publish' button.
home_feature_responsive_desc: On desktop devices, tablets, or smartphones — visualizations are beautiful and readable everywhere.
home_feature_team_desc: Make use of shared folders, integrations, and admin permissions to see what your team is creating.
home_feature_automate_desc: Create, update, and export visualizations without a single click, using our state-of-the-art API.
home_feature_audience_desc: Visualizations scale to the largest audiences and support even millions of viewers.
home_feature_export_desc: Export every visualization as PNG, SVG, or PDF and continue working with tools like Adobe Illustrator.
home_stories_desc: Leading publications like The New York Times and WIRED build charts with DataVis.
home_story_nyt_desc: Leading publication using our platform for daily data journalism and breaking news visualization.
home_story_wired_desc: Tech magazine explaining complex topics with custom dark themes and interactive charts.
home_story_brennan_desc: Nonpartisan law institute presenting policy facts with clear, accessible visualizations.
home_help_academy_desc: Over 250+ Academy articles explain how to create each chart type, step by step. Plus: how to upload data, embed charts, and more.
home_help_support_desc: If you still have questions after consulting our Academy, do write us! Our customer happiness team will be back in touch as quickly as possible.

resource_usage.title: Resource Usage
resource_usage.warning_description: You're nearing your usage limits. Consider upgrading your plan.

home_cta_title: Try it for yourself, without signing up
home_cta_desc: No data? You can use our sample data.
home_share_desc: Seamlessly share and embed your visualisations across platforms—websites, presentations, social media assets and more. Watch them adapt beautifully to any screen, captivating audiences across all devices.
home_interactive_desc: Transform raw data into interactive visualizations that are as sleek as they are engaging. Say goodbye to static charts and let your audience explore, connect, and truly understand your story.

notification_settings_subtitle: Manage how you receive notifications from the app

forecast_create_subtitle: Generate AI-powered predictions for your time series data
forecast_error_already_in_progress_desc: You already have a forecast being processed. Please wait for it to complete before creating a new one.
forecast_error_target_column_required_de: Please select the target column to forecast
forecast_step1_desc: Choose a dataset from your workspace to use for forecasting.
forecast_step1_requirements: For best results, use a time series dataset where each row is one time step (e.g. one day, month, or year), the data is sorted by time, and you have at least one numeric column you want to forecast (such as sales, traffic, or temperature). Avoid using pure ID or time columns themselves as the value to forecast.
forecast_step1_no_datasets_desc: You need to create a dataset first before you can generate forecasts.
forecast_step2_desc: Set up your forecast parameters and model configuration.
forecast_step2_forecast_name_desc: Give your forecast a descriptive name (optional).
forecast_step2_target_column_desc: The target variable to be the focus of the forecast.
forecast_step2_feature_columns_desc: Select additional numeric columns to use as features for the forecast.
forecast_step2_feature_columns_no_availa: No numeric columns available for features
forecast_step2_model_lstm_desc1: Best for complex, non-linear patterns with enough data.
forecast_step2_model_lstm_desc2: Slower to train, but can capture richer dynamics.
forecast_step2_model_svr_desc1: Best for small/medium datasets and smoother trends.
forecast_step2_model_svr_desc2: Faster and more stable when data is limited.
forecast_step2_forecast_window_desc: Number of data points to forecast into the future.
forecast_step2_analyze_after_desc: If enabled, an AI analysis will be generated for the forecast chart once it is created.
forecast_step3_desc: View the generated forecast predictions and model output
forecast_step3_creating_desc: Our AI is training the model and generating predictions. This may take a few minutes depending on your data size.
forecast_step3_processing: Processing... This may take a few minutes
forecast_step3_navigate_away: You can navigate away from this page. You'll be notified when it's ready!
forecast_step3_completed_desc: Redirecting you to view your forecast results...
forecast_step3_failed_desc: There was an error creating your forecast. Please try again.
forecast_step3_no_results: Enter your data and click "Generate Forecast" to see results here
forecast_list_subtitle: View and manage your time series forecasts
forecast_list_search_placeholder: Search forecasts by name, target column, or dataset...
forecast_list_no_match_desc: Try adjusting your filters to see more results.
forecast_list_no_forecasts_desc: Get started by creating your first time series forecast. Our AI will analyze your data and generate predictions.
forecast_detail_r2_desc: Measures how well the model explains the variance in the data. Values closer to 1.0 indicate better fit.
forecast_detail_rmse_desc: Measures the average magnitude of prediction errors. Lower values indicate better accuracy.
forecast_detail_mae_desc: Measures the average absolute difference between predicted and actual values. Lower values indicate better accuracy.
forecast_detail_mape_desc: Measures the average percentage difference between predicted and actual values. Lower percentages indicate better accuracy.
forecast_detail_chart_unavailable: Chart visualization will be available here once generated
forecast_detail_analysis_unavailable: Analysis will be available here once generated
forecast_detail_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this forecast?
forecast_detail_analysis_started_desc: AI analysis has been started. You will be notified when it completes. You can navigate away from this page.
forecast_step1_no_match: No datasets found matching your search
ai_clean_sending_desc: Your dataset is being cleaned by AI. This may take a few minutes depending on size and complexity. You'll be notified when it's done.
ai_clean_success_desc: You will be taken to the next step to create dataset.
ai_clean_upload_success_desc: You will be notified when it's complete.

barChart_editor_description: Interactive bar chart configuration and data editor

notification_privacy_message: We are committed to protecting your personal information. You can change notification settings at any time. Your contact information will not be shared with third parties without your consent.

about_subtitle: We are dedicated to transforming complex data into clear, actionable insights that drive confident decision-making. Our team combines technical expertise with strategic thinking to deliver analytics solutions that are accurate, scalable, and easy to understand.
about_description: We empower businesses worldwide to make data-driven decisions through cutting-edge visualization technology and intelligent analytics platforms.
about_showcase_description: Discover how DataVis transforms complex data into beautiful, actionable insights
about_showcase_realtime_description: Monitor your business metrics with live data visualization
about_showcase_exploration_description: Dive deep into your data with intuitive exploration tools
about_showcase_reporting_description: Share insights across teams with beautiful, automated reports
about_showcase_mobile_description: Access your data insights anywhere, on any device
about_showcase_ai_description: Let artificial intelligence uncover hidden patterns in your data
about_showcase_integration_description: Seamlessly connect with your existing business tools
about_mission_description: To democratize data visualization and make complex analytics accessible to businesses of all sizes, enabling smarter decisions through intuitive insights.
about_vision_description: To be the world's leading data visualization platform, transforming how organizations understand and act on their data in the digital age.
about_values_description: Innovation, transparency, and customer success drive everything we do. We believe data should empower, not overwhelm.
about_features_description: Enterprise-grade features designed for modern data-driven organizations
about_feature_processing_description: Handle massive datasets with our enterprise-grade processing engine
about_feature_dashboards_description: Create stunning, real-time dashboards with drag-and-drop simplicity
about_feature_analytics_description: AI-powered insights that help you stay ahead of trends
about_feature_collaboration_description: Share insights and collaborate seamlessly across your organization
about_feature_security_description: Bank-level security with SOC 2 compliance and data encryption
about_feature_scale_description: Trusted by companies worldwide with 99.9% uptime guarantee
about_awards_description: Trusted by industry leaders and recognized globally
about_contact_description: Join thousands of companies already using DataVis to drive growth
about_youtube_description: Subscribe to our channel for tutorials, tips, and updates on data visualization
about_team_description: Meet the web development team behind DataVis
demo_description_toast: Demo various toast notifications with many different options
demo_description_modal: Demo confirmation modal with various types and options

sample_data_description: Generated samples based on chart type. Previous static samples are hidden.
sample_line_chart_desc: Follow a 3‑year journey of regional sales where seasons drive predictable peaks and dips, and each region (North, South, East, West, Central) pushes the total forward.
sample_bar_chart_desc: Compare how each product SKU performs across regions and channels—online, retail, and wholesale—then see how returns reshape the final net story.
sample_area_chart_desc: Watch regions stack together month by month as seasonal demand swells and fades, showing how each area lifts the total over time.
sample_scatter_chart_desc: Explore a housing market snapshot where larger homes in pricier cities command higher prices while beds, baths, and age bend the trendline.
sample_pie_chart_desc: See how a marketing budget fragments across channels and how that spend converts into attention, clicks, and ultimately conversions.
sample_donut_chart_desc: A ringed view of the marketing mix—compare slices at a glance and read the story of reach, engagement, and outcomes by channel.
ai_clean_description: Use AI to automatically clean and standardize your data. Choose between Excel files or CSV text.
ai_clean_notes_placeholder: Optional notes for AI. Leave empty to use default behaviour.
ai_clean_notes_hint: Optional notes about the cleaning process (multiple lines supported)
ai_clean_preview_text: Numbers will use {thousands} for thousands and {decimal} for decimals.
ai_clean_drop_file: Drop Excel or CSV file here
ai_clean_click_upload: Click to upload or drag and drop Excel/CSV file
ai_clean_csv_hint: Paste your CSV data with headers in the first row
ai_clean_error_select_file: Please select a valid Excel or CSV file (.xlsx, .xls, .csv)
docs_subtitle: Learn how to create beautiful, interactive data visualizations with DataVis
docs_intro_text: DataVis is a powerful data visualization platform that helps you create stunning charts and graphs from your data. Whether you're a student, researcher, or professional, DataVis makes it easy to transform raw data into meaningful insights.
docs_benefit_1: Easy-to-use chart editor with drag-and-drop interface
docs_benefit_3: Support for multiple chart types and customization options
docs_benefit_4: Export charts in various formats (PNG, SVG, PDF)
docs_quick_start_intro: Get started with DataVis in just a few minutes:
docs_step_1_desc: Sign up for a free account to start creating charts.
docs_free_tier: The free tier includes unlimited charts and 5GB of storage.
docs_step_2_desc: Upload your data in CSV, Excel, or JSON format. You can also paste data directly.
docs_step_3_desc: Select from our library of chart types including line, bar, pie, scatter, and more.
docs_first_chart_intro: Let's create your first chart step by step:
docs_navigate_charts_desc: Click on 'Charts' in the navigation menu.
docs_click_new_chart_desc: This will open the chart creation wizard.
docs_select_dataset_desc: Choose an existing dataset or upload a new one.
docs_configure_chart_desc: Select chart type, axes, and customize appearance.
docs_tip_preview_desc: Use the preview panel to see your chart update in real-time as you make changes.
docs_chart_types_intro: DataVis supports a wide variety of chart types:
docs_line_chart_desc: Perfect for showing trends over time
docs_data_sources_intro: DataVis supports multiple ways to import your data:
docs_file_upload_desc: Upload files in the following formats:
docs_paste_data_desc: Copy and paste data directly from spreadsheets or other sources.
docs_sample_data_desc: Try our pre-loaded sample datasets to explore features.
docs_file_size_limit_desc: Maximum file size is 50MB. For larger datasets, consider splitting your data or using our API.
docs_clean_data_intro: Our AI-powered data cleaning feature automatically standardizes and cleans your data:
docs_clean_numbers_desc: Automatically detect and normalize thousands separators and decimal points
docs_clean_duplicates_desc: Identify and remove duplicate rows automatically
docs_clean_text_desc: Trim whitespace, fix encoding issues, and standardize text
docs_ai_tip_desc: You can provide custom notes to guide the AI cleaning process for domain-specific data.
docs_themes_intro: Customize the appearance of your charts with themes:
docs_best_practices_intro: Follow these best practices to create effective visualizations:
docs_tip_1_desc: Use line charts for trends, bar charts for comparisons, and pie charts for proportions. Match the chart type to your data and message.
docs_tip_2_desc: Avoid cluttering your charts with too much information. Focus on the key message you want to convey.
docs_tip_3_desc: Use color to highlight important data points or group related items. Ensure sufficient contrast for readability.
docs_tip_4_desc: Always include clear axis labels, titles, and legends. Your audience should understand the chart without additional explanation.
docs_warning_misleading_desc: Don't manipulate axis scales or use 3D effects that distort data. Always represent data accurately and honestly.
docs_performance_intro: Tips for optimizing chart performance with large datasets:
docs_perf_1_desc: For line and scatter charts, consider aggregating or sampling data if you have more than 10,000 points.
docs_perf_2_desc: Some chart types handle large datasets better than others. Heatmaps and aggregated bar charts work well with large data.
docs_perf_3_desc: For very large datasets, consider disabling animations to improve rendering performance.
docs_need_help_desc: If you have questions or need assistance:
tour_home_welcome_desc: Create beautiful, responsive charts with no coding required. Let's explore what makes DataVis special.
tour_home_build_desc: Start here! Create custom charts from your data with our intuitive editor.
tour_home_templates_desc: Discover our collection of professional chart templates. Click to preview and learn more.
tour_home_features_desc: Everything you need: customization, collaboration, and export options in one platform.
tour_chart_welcome_desc: Manage and visualize your data. This is your personal dashboard for all your charts.
tour_chart_create_desc: Start visualizing! Create a new chart from your datasets with just one click.
tour_chart_search_desc: Use search and filters to quickly locate specific charts by name, type, or date.
tour_chart_actions_desc: View, edit, duplicate, or delete your charts directly from the card menu.
tour_dataset_welcome_desc: Manage your data efficiently. This is your central hub for all your datasets.
tour_dataset_create_desc: Upload files, paste data, or use AI to clean messy data. Get started here.
tour_dataset_search_desc: Quickly search and sort your datasets to find exactly what you need.
tour_dataset_actions_desc: View details, edit, or create charts directly from your dataset card.
tour_dataset_import_desc: Choose how you want to bring your data in. We support multiple formats and methods.
tour_dataset_method_desc: Upload files, paste text, use sample data, or let AI clean your data for you.
tour_dataset_ai_desc: Got messy data? Let our AI assistant clean and format it automatically.
tour_editor_welcome_desc: Create stunning visualizations with our powerful editor. Let's take a quick tour of the main features to get you started.
tour_editor_type_desc: Start by selecting the perfect chart type for your data. We offer a wide range of options from simple bars to complex heatmaps.
tour_editor_basic_desc: Configure the fundamental aspects of your chart, such as orientation and basic layout options.
tour_editor_series_desc: Control your data here. Add or remove series, and map your dataset columns to chart axes.
tour_editor_settings_desc: Fine-tune the look and feel. Adjust colors, labels, legends, and other visual properties to match your style.
tour_editor_preview_desc: See your changes in real-time. This interactive preview shows exactly how your chart will look.
tour_editor_save_desc: Once you are happy with your chart, click here to save it to your workspace. You can then share it or use it in dashboards.
tour_gallery_welcome_desc: Choose from dozens of beautiful chart templates. Find the perfect one for your data.
tour_gallery_dataset_desc: Choose a dataset to work with, or skip to use sample data.
tour_gallery_filter_desc: Narrow down your choices by category, type, or purpose to find exactly what you need.
tour_gallery_templates_desc: Browse our collection. Click any template to preview and start creating.
tour_pricing_welcome_desc: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Upgrade anytime as you grow.
tour_pricing_compare_desc: Browse our tiers. From free starter plans to enterprise solutions, we have you covered.
tour_pricing_features_desc: Check the features list to see exactly what you get with each plan.
tour_pricing_subscribe_desc: Ready to upgrade? Click to subscribe and unlock premium features instantly.
lineChart_editor_editDataDescription: Click 'Edit Data' to open spreadsheet-like editor
lineChart_editor_moreRows: And {{count}} more rows... (Click 'Edit Data' to view all)
lineChart_editor_navigationHint: Use Tab to move horizontally • Enter to move down
chart_creation_subtitle: Build beautiful, interactive charts from your data
chart_creation_dataset_subtitle: Choose your data source to get started

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we protect your data.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content1: At DataVis, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.
intro.content2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

infoCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
personalList: Name and email address when you create an account
Profile information you choose to provide
Payment information (processed securely by third-party providers)

howUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:

serviceDelivery.title: Service Delivery:
list: Provide and maintain our services
Process your transactions
Send you technical notices and updates
Respond to your inquiries
Provide customer support

improvements.title: Improvements:
list: Improve our services and features
Understand usage patterns
Develop new features
Prevent fraud and abuse
Ensure platform security

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
list: Service Providers: With trusted third-party service providers who help us operate our platform
Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, sale, or acquisition
With Your Consent: When you explicitly agree to share your information

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information.
typesList: Essential Cookies: Required for the service to function properly
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how users interact with our service
Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences
cookies.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling them may affect your experience.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
list: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Regular security audits and updates
Secure data centers with restricted access
Employee training on data protection
Multi-factor authentication options
security.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
list: Access: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
Data Portability: Request transfer of your data to another service
Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for data processing where applicable
Object: Object to certain types of data processing
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
list: Active account data: Retained while your account is active
Deleted account data: Removed within 90 days of account deletion
Legal compliance data: Retained as required by applicable laws
Analytics data: Anonymized and retained for service improvement

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content1: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
children.content2: If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately, and we will take steps to remove that information from our systems.

transfer.title: 10. International Data Transfers
transfer.content1: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on computers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where data protection laws may differ.
transfer.content2: We ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your personal information in accordance with this Privacy Policy when transferred internationally.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
changes.content2: We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Your continued use of the service after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.addressValue: 123 Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA

summary.title: Your Privacy Matters
summary.desc: We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data with care and transparency. If you have any questions or concerns about how we handle your information, please don't hesitate to reach out.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using DataVis

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing and using DataVis ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Service.
acceptance.content2: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of DataVis, including any content, functionality, and services offered on or through our platform.

accounts.title: 2. User Accounts
creationList: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials
You must be at least 13 years old to use this service
You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account
accounts.terminationContent: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these Terms or for any other reason we deem appropriate.

use.title: 3. Acceptable Use
use.intro: You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes. You agree NOT to:
prohibitedList: Use automated systems to scrape data

ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property Rights
ip.yourContentText: You retain all rights to the data and content you upload to DataVis. By uploading content, you grant us a license to use, store, and display your content solely for the purpose of providing the Service.
ip.ourContentText: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by DataVis and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

warranties.title: 5. Disclaimer of Warranties
warranties.caps: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND.
warranties.text1: We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. We make no warranties about the accuracy, reliability, or availability of the Service.
warranties.text2: Your use of the Service is at your sole risk. We are not responsible for any loss of data or damages resulting from your use of the Service.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.caps: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, DATAVIS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, OR ANY LOSS OF DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES.
liability.text: Our total liability to you for any claims arising out of or relating to these Terms or the Service shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve (12) months prior to the claim.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.text1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
changes.text2: Your continued use of the Service after any modifications indicates your acceptance of the updated Terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
contact.addressValue: 123 Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA

summary.title: Summary
summary.desc: By using DataVis, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. We reserve the right to update these terms at any time, and your continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of any changes.
summary.contactPrefix: For questions or concerns, please contact us at

chat_welcome_message: I'm an AI assistant specializing in data analysis. Ask me anything about DataVis or data analysis.
docs_ai_analysis_intro: Leverage AI to automatically analyze your charts and gain deeper insights from your data. Our AI assistant can identify trends, patterns, anomalies, and provide actionable recommendations.
docs_ai_what_is_desc: AI Chart Analysis uses advanced machine learning algorithms to examine your visualizations and provide intelligent insights. It can detect patterns that might not be immediately obvious and suggest ways to improve your data presentation.
docs_ai_how_to_use: How to Use AI Chart Analysis
docs_ai_step_1_desc: Navigate to the chart you want to analyze in the Chart Editor.
docs_ai_step_2_desc: Look for the AI analysis button in the chart toolbar (usually marked with a brain or sparkle icon).
docs_ai_step_3_desc: The AI will analyze your chart and present findings in an easy-to-understand format with visualizations and explanations.
docs_ai_step_4_desc: Use the suggested improvements to enhance your chart or gain deeper understanding of your data.
docs_ai_trends_desc: Upward, downward, or cyclical patterns in your data over time.
docs_ai_anomalies_desc: Outliers and unusual data points that deviate from expected patterns.
docs_ai_correlations_desc: Relationships between different data series or variables.
docs_ai_distributions_desc: How your data is spread and whether it follows normal or skewed patterns.
docs_ai_use_case_1_desc: Identify seasonal trends in sales data, detect unusual spikes or drops, and get recommendations for forecasting.
docs_ai_use_case_2_desc: Discover peak traffic hours, identify anomalies that might indicate issues, and understand user behavior patterns.
docs_ai_use_case_3_desc: Detect unusual transactions, analyze spending patterns, and identify correlations between different expense categories.
docs_ai_tip_1: Ensure your data is clean and properly formatted before analysis
docs_ai_tip_2: Provide context about your data to get more relevant insights
docs_ai_tip_3: Use AI analysis as a starting point, not a replacement for domain expertise
docs_ai_tip_4: Larger datasets (100+ data points) generally produce more reliable insights
docs_chatbox_intro: Create charts using natural language! Simply describe what you want to visualize, and our AI ChatBox will generate the chart for you. No technical knowledge required.
docs_chatbox_what_is_desc: ChatBox is an AI-powered conversational interface that understands your data visualization needs in plain language. Instead of manually configuring charts, you can simply chat with the AI to create, modify, and refine your visualizations.
docs_chatbox_step_1_desc: Click the ChatBox icon in the Chart Editor or navigate to the ChatBox page from the main menu.
docs_chatbox_step_2_desc: Choose the dataset you want to visualize, or upload a new one.
docs_chatbox_step_3_desc: Type what you want to see in natural language. Be specific about:
docs_chatbox_step_4_desc: Continue chatting to make adjustments. Ask the AI to change colors, add labels, modify axes, or try different chart types.
docs_chatbox_tip_1_desc: The more details you provide, the better the AI can understand your needs.
docs_chatbox_tip_2_desc: Reference exact column names from your dataset for accuracy.
docs_chatbox_tip_3_desc: Make one change at a time for better control over the final result.
docs_chatbox_tip_4_desc: If unsure, ask the AI for suggestions or recommendations.
docs_forecast_intro: Predict future trends using AI-powered forecasting. DataVis uses advanced machine learning models to analyze historical data and generate accurate predictions with confidence intervals.
docs_forecast_what_is_desc: AI Forecasting analyzes patterns in your historical data to predict future values. It automatically detects seasonality, trends, and other patterns to generate reliable predictions.
docs_forecast_feature_1_desc: Identifies long-term upward or downward movements
docs_forecast_feature_3_desc: Shows prediction uncertainty with upper/lower bounds
docs_forecast_step_1_desc: Your dataset must have a date/time column and at least one numerical column to forecast.
docs_forecast_requirement: Minimum: 30 data points for reliable forecasts. More data = better accuracy.
docs_forecast_step_2_desc: Start by creating a line chart with your time-series data. Select the date column for X-axis and the metric to forecast for Y-axis.
docs_forecast_step_3_desc: In the Chart Editor, look for the "Forecast" or "AI Prediction" option in the settings panel. Toggle it on.
docs_forecast_param_1_desc: How far into the future to predict
docs_forecast_step_5_desc: The AI will generate predictions shown as a continuation of your line chart with shaded confidence intervals. Review the forecast and adjust settings if needed.
docs_forecast_line_desc: The predicted values extending beyond your historical data. This is the most likely outcome based on past patterns.
docs_forecast_interval_desc: The range where actual values are likely to fall. A wider interval means more uncertainty. For example, a 95% confidence interval means there's a 95% chance the actual value will be within this range.
docs_forecast_accuracy_desc: DataVis provides metrics like MAPE (Mean Absolute Percentage Error) to help you understand forecast reliability. Lower values indicate better accuracy.
docs_forecast_practice_1_desc: For daily data, have at least 3-6 months. For monthly data, have at least 2-3 years. More historical data improves accuracy.
docs_forecast_practice_2_desc: Remove outliers and fill missing values before forecasting. Use the AI Data Cleaning feature to prepare your data.
docs_forecast_practice_3_desc: AI forecasts are based on historical patterns. Major events (holidays, promotions, market changes) may affect accuracy. Use forecasts as guidance, not absolute truth.
docs_forecast_practice_4_desc: Forecasts become less reliable the further into the future you go. For best results, forecast no more than 20-30% beyond your historical data period.
docs_forecast_case_1_desc: Predict future revenue, plan inventory, and set realistic targets.
docs_forecast_case_2_desc: Estimate future user base, plan infrastructure, and allocate resources.
docs_forecast_case_3_desc: Anticipate product demand, optimize stock levels, and reduce waste.
docs_forecast_case_4_desc: Project expenses, allocate budgets, and plan financial resources.
